text:
November 13, 1956
Miss Sydna Ellis
106 Berkley Way
Whitlier, California
Dear Miss Ellis*
This is with reference to your letter of November 9 concerning
your Interest in obtaining our programs which are suitable for
schoolroom situations* I regret to inform you that this will
not be possible*
The programs we distribute for classroom use are not available
for use elsewhere except under certain extraordinary circumÂ¬
stances* Also, the cost involved in obtaining all of these
programs would, I fear, be prohibitive for an individual.
Therefore, I am sorry to state that we cannot fulfill your
request*
Sincerely,
REU * arp
Robert E* Underwood, Jr<
Network Manager
